content.rendered:
Our stylish bouquets are designed for those who appreciate bold and contemporary expressions, highlighting the finest seasonal flowers available in our studio on the day.

Drawing inspiration from the sleek trends of Melbourne and Sydney, our bouquets feature the finest flowers, with reflexed roses for a luxurious finish.

Finished with our signature wrap and trailing ribbon, OR with the option to presented in a contemporary glass vase.

The beauty of nature lies in its diversity, and we embrace this philosophy. All L&R designs are unique and one-of-a-kind. Images provided are for illustrative purposes only. The bouquet you receive will depend on the season and availability. Place your trust in us to choose the finest flowers to convey your sentiments.

Size guide ~ Plinth diameter 32cm
Generous option pictured. Contemporary glass vase not included in this price.

GST Included. Delivery calculated at checkout.

excerpt.rendered: “Designer Bouquets | White & Pink Roses, Stock, Delphinium | Peach & Lemon Roses, Orchids, Daffodils | Burgundy Roses, Dahlias | Gold Coast Flower Delivery
